title: £230.00 pw -Studio in Fitzjohns Ave, Hampstead, London, Ref: 223
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Fitzjohns Ave, Hampstead, London, NW3
£230.00 Per Week
Ref: 223

Property Details
We are happy to offer this beautiful and bright newly refurbished studio apartment in Fitzjohns Avenue, Hampstead, London NW3

The property consists of:
* Beautifully presented newly refurbished studio bed apartment with a large kitchen and shower room
* The rent includes gas and water bills
*  Large Communal Garden
* Hampstead tube station and high street are only a couple of minutes walk away as are the many popular and fashionable shops, cafes, bars and restaurants of this desirable London location.
* Fitzjohns Avenue is a sought-after residential area close to Hampstead High Street, Belsize Park, Hampstead Heath and Hampstead Underground Station.
* Walking distance from the shops and facilities of Swiss Cottage and Finchley road. Finchley Road Underground Station (Jubilee and Metropolitan lines) is close by for links throughout London.
